.entry-header
About Us
About Us
Step into West Palm Beach’s Ultimate Nightlife Destination
Nestled in the heart of Clematis Street, Clematis Social redefines nightlife in West Palm Beach with its blend of sophistication and vibrant energy. From its roots as iconic venues like Dr. Feelgoods and Pawn Shop, Clematis Social has evolved into a premier hotspot that embodies the city’s dynamic spirit.
Our venue boasts stunning decor inspired by Miami’s Design District, including a breathtaking three-story floral mural by Amanda Valdez. With immersive lighting, a high-energy dance floor, and South Florida’s best DJs, Clematis Social creates unforgettable experiences every Thursday through Sunday. Whether you’re enjoying a game of pool in our chic lounge, playing oversized chess, or dancing the night away under laser lights, every corner offers something unique.
Perfect for intimate nights or grand private events hosting up to 350 guests, Clematis Social delivers unparalleled service and ambiance. With a stylish club-chic dress code and hours extending late into the night, we’re the ultimate destination for those seeking exceptional nightlife. Join us for a night you’ll never forget!
Our Mission
At Clematis Social, our mission is to redefine nightlife in West Palm Beach by delivering unforgettable experiences that blend style, energy, and inclusivity. We strive to create a vibrant space where guests can connect, celebrate, and enjoy exceptional service, innovative entertainment, and a sophisticated ambiance that reflects the dynamic spirit of our community.
Our Vision
Our vision is to be the premier nightlife destination in South Florida, setting the standard for innovation, excellence, and immersive experiences. We aim to inspire unforgettable moments by continuously evolving our offerings, fostering a culture of creativity, and building lasting connections with our guests and the vibrant Clematis Street community.

GALLERY
Our Memories
Relive the energy and excitement of Clematis Social through our curated gallery of unforgettable moments. From vibrant dance floors to chic private events, these snapshots capture the essence of West Palm Beach’s premier nightlife destination.

Private Events
Host your next unforgettable event at Clematis Social! Whether it’s a birthday, corporate gathering, or milestone celebration, our stylish West Palm Beach venue offers customizable spaces, curated cocktails, and a vibrant nightlife vibe. Let us bring your vision to life and make it a night to remember!
